name: OC Flight Lessons
about: OC Flight Lessons, established in 2003, is a premier FAA-approved flight training academy based at John Wayne Airport in California. Owned and operated by Omar Amin, a former airline captain and chief flight instructor, the school offers personalized and professional training from certified instructors. With a focus on safety and excellence, OC Flight Lessons provides programs ranging from Private Pilot to Commercial and Airline Pilot certifications. The school is known for its individualized classroom settings, state-of-the-art RedBird simulator training, and a commitment to helping students achieve their aviation goals. OC Flight Lessons is dedicated to making flight training enjoyable, affordable, and free of hidden costs, ensuring a seamless journey for aspiring pilots. Join us to start your flying career with a team that prioritizes your success.
